properties.areaDesc: Straits of Florida from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile Bridge out 20 NM; Straits of Florida from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile Bridge 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to Craig Key 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to Craig Key out 20 NM
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued February 1 at 12:22AM EST until February 1 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Key West FL
properties.description:
For the following areas...
Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef west end of Seven Mile Bridge out
60 nm...

At 1221 AM EST, strong thunderstorms with possible waterspouts were
located along a line extending from 20 nm east of Carysfort Reef
Light to 18 nm southeast of Spiegel Grove to Floyd's Wall Northeast
to 6 nm southwest of Floyd's Wall Southwest, moving southeast at 30
knots.

HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Waterspouts can quickly form and capsize boats, cause
considerable damage to vessels and create suddenly higher
waves. Expect wind gusts in excess of 34 knots, suddenly
higher waves, frequent lightning, and heavy downpours.

Locations in the warning include...
409 Humps, Floyd's Wall Southwest, Rips, South Rips and Floyd's Wall
Northeast.
properties.instruction:
Prepare for wind gusts in excess of 35 knots, steep and fast-building
seas, frequent lightning strikes, and blinding downpours. Stay low or
go below, and make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

NWSheadline: A SPECIAL MARINE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM EST
